publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2363 Donald Gorrie: Help the Aged’s New Year’s Resolutions—That the Parliament welcomes Help the Aged’s New Year’s resolution campaign to push to eradicate excess winter deaths in Scotland, support a vulnerable adults bill, increase benefit uptake for older people and provide widely-available chiropody services; further welcomes the resolution to reform the council tax to ensure that it is fair, and believes that this is best achieved by abolishing the council tax and replacing it with a fairer local income tax based on the ability to pay. Supported by: Margaret Smith*, Mike Rumbles*, Robert Brown*, Nora Radcliffe*, Tommy Sheridan*
